description:
Why should you take this course?

Entrepreneurs often worry about not having enough money to fund retirement. In many cases, retirement planning is the last item on a very long to-do list. The lack of security and steady paychecks from regular employment make it all the more important to put a plan in place. This course is specifically designed to teach entrepreneurs how to use the solo 401(k) to secure their financial future.

You will learn:

  • 29 lectures and 1.5 hours of content
  • How consistently saving money in a solo 401(k) results in hundreds of thousands of dollars for you to enjoy in retirement
  • How to reduce your taxes year after year by making contributions as both employer and employee
  • A unique way to turbo charge your savings by hiring your spouse
  • How to calculate your self-employment taxes-a major step in determining how much you can place in your 401(k) as the employer
  • , How to set up a plan
  • The fee structure involved when you open and maintain a plan. You’ll learn what’s reasonable and how to compare fees
  • The investment choices offered in many plans
  • How your solo 401(k) relates to the stock market
  • What you need to know about investment time horizons and your risk tolerance
  • Where to open a solo 401(k)
  • The rules for loans and how to determine the amount you can borrow
  • The rarely known tax penalty for not making distribution on time
  • How 401(k) minimum distributions are made and what happens to your 401(k) in the case of your death

This course is designed to give you the confidence you need to manage a solo 401(k). You’ll experience a classic classroom setting. The course contains plenty of examples and quizzes to reinforce each concept. After completing this course, you will gain a “Cradle to Grave” knowledge of these plans—your key to saving thousands of dollars and reducing your taxes.
title: The Ultimate Guide to Solo 401(k)s for Entrepreneurs
